main event: A civilian reported observing a large red and white spinning light in Millard, Nebraska on April 11, 1966.
interesting points: The object was observed for 15 minutes and displayed stationary and spinning behavior., The object was described as being 1/3 the size of a basketball., The observation occurred during clear night conditions with a full moon., The witness reported no sound emanating from the object., The star Sirius was noted to be in the approximate position of the object.
sighted object: large red and white spinning light
